articles.title: Russian Foreign Minister open to discussing U.S. prisoner swap offer involving Brittney Griner
articles.description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov says he is open to a call with U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken to discuss a possible prisoner swap involving Brittney Griner.

articles.title: Los Angeles Angels' Shohei Ohtani on his future - 'Right now I'm an Angel'
articles.description: With the trade deadline looming, Shohei Ohtani addressed questions about his future Thursday night, saying, "Right now I'm an Angel, and that's all I can focus on."
articles.content:
Los Angeles Angels star Shohei Ohtani addressed questions about his future in Anaheim following a 2-0 loss to the Texas Rangers on Thursday night that dropped his team 15 games below .500.

articles.author: Josh WeinfussESPN Staff Writer
articles.title: Phoenix Mercury's Diana Taurasi first WNBA player to score 30 at age 40 or older
articles.description: Phoenix Mercury star Diana Taurasi became the first WNBA player ever to score 30 points in a game at age 40 or older, and joined Michael Jordan and Dirk Nowitzki as the only ones to do it in WNBA/NBA history.
articles.content:
It seems hard to imagine, but Phoenix Mercury star Diana Taurasi found even more rarified air to be in Thursday night.
Taurasi scored 30 points in Phoenix's 90-80 win over the Los Angeles Sparks, be… [+1836 chars]

articles.title: Madden hotline fields 1,000 calls as it opens to take fans' ratings complaints
articles.description: EA Sports on Thursday launched a ratings hotline where fans, players of the game and, theoretically, actual NFL players could call to complain or make other comments about the latest Madden ratings.
articles.content:
Do you have a problem with one of the ratings in EA Sports' Madden NFL 23? Now, there's a place you can take your gripes that isn't social media.
